participant_1.background:
My first purchase was a baseball glove for my son.
i like to write poetry in my spare time.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
i work graveyard in a hotel.
i recently lost both my parents to an automobile accident.

participant_2.background:
I eat breakfast with my grandpa before he takes me to get ice cream.
i work in retail.
My dogs are always there to greet me when I get home, no matter how bad my day has been.
my next job will be in the federal court.
I'm afraid to come out to my family.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
Not too bad, I just got back from a walk with my dogs.
That sounds nice, I love dogs.
Yeah, they are always happy to see me and they make me forget about everything else.
I recently lost both of my parents in a car accident, and I have been finding it hard to cope.
I am so sorry to hear that. I can't imagine what you are going through right now.
It's been tough, but I am trying to get through it.
I know you can. You are strong and you will get through this.
No problem. If you ever need to talk, I am here for you.
Thank you, I will keep that in mind.
I hope you have a good rest of your day.
